subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Britain, which has not fielded an Olympic men’s soccer team since 1960, lost its lead late and tied Senegal, 1-1, in its opening match.
snippet: Britain, which has not fielded an Olympic men’s soccer team since 1960, lost its lead late and tied Senegal, 1-1, in its opening match.
